description: President-elect Maia Sandu says Russian forces should leave the breakaway Trans-Dniester region.
title: Moldova's new president calls for Russian troops to withdraw from territory
title_page: Moldova's new president calls for Russian troops to withdraw from territory - BBC News
maintext: "This is not just a declaration - this is a necessity," she added, stating that she would "work with Russia for as long as it takes to solve the issue of the arms removal and troop withdrawal".
